unit.name: Land Speeder Storm
unit.notes: May transport one unit of Scouts.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Venerable
unit.notes: May only be added to a Dreadnought unit of any configuration.

unit.name: Death Company Dreadnought
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Mortis
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Deathwing
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Furioso
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Hellfire
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Ironclad
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Siege
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Armed with either Twin Lascannon or Twin Heavy Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Twin Heavy Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Blood Angels Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Armed with either Twin Lascannon or Twin Heavy Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Twin Heavy Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Razorback
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Blood Angels Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Siege Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Damocles Command Rhino
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Grey Knights Rhino
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Grey Knights Razorback
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted; Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwing Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted; Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Achilles
unit.notes: May transport one infantry unit without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Anvilarum
unit.notes: May transport one Dreadnought or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Crusader
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwatch Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Helios
unit.notes: Armed with either a Hyperios or Whirlwind Launcher. May transport one infantry unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs or Mounted. Counts as a Land Raider for the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Prometheus
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Land Raider Wrath of Mjalnar
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator unit or two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted.

unit.name: Bastion
unit.notes: Must take either two Rapier Laser Destroyers or two Thunderfire Cannons. A Bastion counts as a ruins terrain piece once destroyed.
unit.crit: The Bastion takes an extra point of damage.

unit.name: Fellblade
unit.crit: The Fellblade is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Glaive
unit.crit: The Glaive is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units, Attack Bikes or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up.
unit.crit: The unit and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Grey Knights Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up. Critical Hit Effect: The unit and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on 4+.

unit.name: Stormwolf Assault Boat
unit.notes: May transport six infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each. Counts as a Landing Craft for the purposes of being transported.
unit.crit: The Stormwolf and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Stormraven
unit.notes: May transport one Terminator or two infantry units without Mounted. May in addition transport one Dreadnought. Counts as a Drop Pod for the purpose of being transported.

unit.name: Corvus Blackstar Dropship
unit.notes: May transport three infantry units or Attack Bikes. Terminators count as one and a half units each, rounding up. May in addition transport one Dreadnought or Land Speeder.

unit.name: Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each. Counts as a Thunderhawk for the purpose of being transported.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Darkwing Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport eight infantry units, Attack Bikes; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Iron Hands Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Dreadnoughts, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos, Stalkers and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Deathwatch Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Grey Knights Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry up to two of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos and Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as two units each. In addition it may also carry any infantry transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units, Attack Bikes or Dreadnoughts; Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each; plus any six armoured vehicle units (except H-AV, Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as one and a half units each, rounding up.
unit.crit: The Landing Craft and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport.

unit.name: Dark Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport. May in addition transport five Corvus Blackstars and three Thunderhawk Transporters along with any units these transport.

unit.name: Vanguard Class Light Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 12 infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus five light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts); plus two Thunderhawks and enough Drop Pods to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 20 infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus 10 light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts); plus six Thunderhawks and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Grey Knights Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 20 infantry units, Attack Bikes, Dreadnoughts; plus 10 light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes and Dreadnoughts) ; plus 6 Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Battle Barge
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
unit.notes: May transport 30 infantry units, Attack Bikes, or Dreadnoughts; plus 20 armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes or Dreadnoughts); plus 9 Thunderhawks and enough Drop Pods or Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Drop Pod
unit.notes: May transport one formation of only the following units: Tacticals, Devastators, Dreadnought, Sternguard Veterans, Wolf Guard Terminators, Grey Knights Strike Squad, Grey Knights Purgation Squad. After the Drop Pod lands, its Deathwind attacks all enemy units within 15cm. Each enemy formation attacked receives a Blast Marker for coming under fire, and an extra Blast Marker for each casualty. Then any troops carried in the Drop Pod must disembark within 5cm of the Drop Pod or within 5cm of another unit from the same formation that has already landed, so long as all units are placed within 15cm of the Drop Pod. Drop pod models should be removed from the board once the formation they transport has disembarked.

unit.name: Impulsor
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Aggressors and Eradicators counts as two units each.

unit.name: Repulsor
unit.notes: May transport two infantry units without Jump Packs or Mounted. Aggressors and Eradicators counts as two units each.

unit.name: Astraeus
unit.crit: The Astraeus is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.
